data.title: Usage Statistics and Market Share of Character Encodings for Websites, August 2024
data.meta_description: What are the most popular character encodings on the web
data.text:
Technologies > Character Encodings

Usage statistics of character encodings for websites

This diagram shows the percentages of websites using various character encodings. See technologies overview for explanations on the methodologies used in the surveys. Our reports are updated daily.

How to read the diagram:

UTF-8 is used by 98.3% of all the websites whose character encoding we know.

UTF-8

98.3%

W3Techs.com, 12 August 2024Percentages of websites using various character encodings

Note: a website may use more than one character encoding
